p.k: French pianist Anne Queffélec performs Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 1 in F minor, Op. 2/1, Piano Sonata No. 14 ("Moonlight") in C-sharp minor, marked Quasi una fantasia, Op. 27, No. 2 and Piano Sonata No. 32 in C minor, Op. 111, the last of van Beethoven's piano sonatas. The recital took place at the Basilique Saint-Sauveur during the Festival de Rocamadour, August 17, 2020.
p.d: French pianist Anne Queffélec performs solo piano music by Ludwig van Beethoven at the atmospheric Basilique Saint-Sauveur, recorded during the Festival de Rocamadour on August 17, 2020. On the program are Beethoven's Sonata No. 1 in F minor, Op. 2/1; Piano Sonata No. 14 ("Moonlight") in C-sharp minor, marked Quasi una fantasia, Op. 27, No. 2; and Piano Sonata No. 32 in C minor, Op. 111 - the very last of Beethoven's piano sonatas.
